name: Temple of Heh
description:
Summary

Platflatformer with roguelike elements. Try to get to the hidden chamber before the doors close. Choose speed, dash or jump-upgrades by running through the corresponding doors. Every run is faster. Escape the Temple of Heh!

Controls
WASD - Move
Mouse - Look
Space - Jump
LCtrl - Dash and slide (Press it right after you land for a speed boost).
R - Restart
